name: XV500 Travel Backpack
emi: Starting  4 interest-free payments of $23 with Affirm.   /mo
about_us: WARNING: Cancer and Reproductive Harm - http://www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
RuggedGuard 600D Material: Defy the elements with confidence.
Versatile Convertibility: Seamlessly switch between duffle bag and backpack modes for your convenience.
Reinforced Durability: Cross-stitched reinforcement at key contact points ensuring extra strength.
Integrated Speaker Access: Enjoy music on-the-go with a zip flap exposing the speaker while secured within the travel bag.
Effortless Accessibility: Access all speaker functions without the hassle of removing it from the bag, thanks to strategically placed zip access points.
Sound-Optimized Mesh: Experience clear audio even with the zip flap open.
Organized Storage: Keep your power cord and accessories handy in the front zipper pocket for easy access.
Comfortable Transportation: Heavy-duty padded chest straps and a waistband provide comfort and security during transport.
Convenient Handling: Easily lift and carry your speaker bag with the top carrying handle.
Utility On-the-Go: Never miss a beat with the built-in bottle opener on the shoulder strap, always ready for action.
